description: Explore how blockchain technology is revolutionizing the art industry, offering new solutions to long-standing issues such as provenance, transparency, and democratization through smart contracts, NFTs, and more.
keywords: blockchain, art, NFTs, digital art, provenance, democratization, smart contracts, art investment, fractional ownership, transparency, art market challenges, environmental concerns, market volatility, regulatory landscape
title: The Intersection of Blockchain and Art: A New Renaissance
